promo-list.title: Students
promo-list.htmlText: We're on a mission to make every student a confident learner. Our flexible tools give you access to learning where and when you need it, so you can work toward achieving your dreams.

promo-list.title: Educators
promo-list.htmlText: We're united with you in our commitment to put the student at the center of everything we do. By working closely with educators to develop student-focused solutions and offering unparalleled support, we help you cultivate capable learners.

promo-list.title: Librarians
promo-list.htmlText: Information must be accessible to be valuable. You are curators of essential educational materials and, supported by our content and digital tools, we can help you promote engagement and discovery.

promo-list.title: Employees
promo-list.htmlText: At Cengage, our culture is defined by accountability to and for each other. We pragmatically and boldly challenge the status quo to advance the way students learn. Together, we improve the lives of millions of learners, globally, every dayâ€”one student at a time.
